Sentencas: This research reports the synthesis, characterization, and electrical properties of the systems EryCe1-yO2-delta (y = 0.05, 0.1, and 0.15), and the effect of the incorporation of sintering aids (2 wt.% of CaO, MgO, and TiO2) on the electrical properties of the composition Er0.1Ce0.9O1.95, to be used as ceramic solid electrolytes in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LT-SOFC).
Titulo: Improving the electrical properties of Er-doped CeO2: effect of sintering aids CaO, MgO, and TiO2 on conductivity

Sentencas: All EryCe1-yO2-delta samples were obtained by mechanochemistry (20 h of milling) and characterized by XRD.
Titulo: Improving the electrical properties of Er-doped CeO2: effect of sintering aids CaO, MgO, and TiO2 on conductivity

Sentencas: The morphology of the pure sintered compositions and with the incorporation of sintering aids (sintered at 1200 degrees C) was evaluated by FE-SEM.
Titulo: Improving the electrical properties of Er-doped CeO2: effect of sintering aids CaO, MgO, and TiO2 on conductivity

Sentencas: Electrical properties as a function of temperature (200-650 degrees C) and frequency (100 Hz-1 MHz) were evaluated by impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Improving the electrical properties of Er-doped CeO2: effect of sintering aids CaO, MgO, and TiO2 on conductivity

Sentencas: It reveals an increase of bulk ionic conductivity for higher contents of Er, as the number of oxygen vacancies increases.
Titulo: Improving the electrical properties of Er-doped CeO2: effect of sintering aids CaO, MgO, and TiO2 on conductivity

Sentencas: The higher value of conductivity (6.7 x 10(-3) S cm(-1)) at 650 degrees C was for the composition Er0.15Ce0.85O1.925, while the ionic conductivity of Er0.1Ce0.9O1.95 at 650 degrees C increased from 2.68 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) to a maximum of 1.54 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Improving the electrical properties of Er-doped CeO2: effect of sintering aids CaO, MgO, and TiO2 on conductivity

Sentencas: S cm(-1) with the incorporation of CaO as additive.
Titulo: Improving the electrical properties of Er-doped CeO2: effect of sintering aids CaO, MgO, and TiO2 on conductivity

Sentencas: These improvements in bulk ionic conductivities can contribute to the development of more efficient electrolytes for the LT-SOFC technology.
Titulo: Improving the electrical properties of Er-doped CeO2: effect of sintering aids CaO, MgO, and TiO2 on conductivity
